description:
Cut from a custom woven canvas that is both durable and lightweight, the KANVUS™ Men's Jean’s delivers surprising softness with forgiving stretch.
While equipped with modern design features for flexibility and convenience, this pant honors its tough jean roots.
KÜHL’s exclusive dying process ensures these comfortable pants age with style.
name: Kuhl Kanvus Jeans, 36" Inseam - Mens
